org.modeshape.connector.filesystem

Class ExternalJsonSidecarExtraPropertyStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.modeshape.connector.filesystem.ExternalJsonSidecarExtraPropertyStore
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.modeshape.jcr.federation.spi.ExtraPropertiesStore

    public class ExternalJsonSidecarExtraPropertyStore
extends Object
    An extension of JsonSidecarExtraPropertyStore that stores the properties in a separate configured directory than the filesystem federation itself. Because the class we're extending is package protected this class is in the org.modeshape.connector.filesystem package.
    Author:
    Mike Durbin

        Default constructor.
        Parameters:
        connector - the FileSystemConnector for which this class will store properties.
        propertyStoreRoot - the root of a filesystem into which properties will be serialized.
